name: Vanguard's Coordinated Tactics
description:
You can only play this card if your party consists of only Pyro and Electro characters: Equip this card to Chevreuse.
When Chevreuse, who has this card equipped, is in play, and after opposing characters take Overloaded reaction DMG: Your next 2 instances of Pyro DMG or Electro DMG dealt +1. (Including Pyro DMG or Electro DMG dealt through Swirl reactions)
(You must have Chevreuse in your deck to add this card to your deck)
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>You can only play this card if your party consists of only <color=#FF9999FF>{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}Pyro</color> and <color=#FFACFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}Electro</color> characters:</color> Equip this card to <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1313]</color>.\nWhen <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1313]</color>, who has this card equipped, is in play, and after opposing characters take Overloaded reaction DMG: Your next 2 instances of $[K103] or $[K104] dealt +1. (Including $[K103] or $[K104] dealt through Swirl reactions)\n(You must have $[A1313] in your deck to add this card to your deck)
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>You can only play this card if your party consists of only <color=#FF9999FF>{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}Pyro</color> and <color=#FFACFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}Electro</color> characters:</color> Equip this card to <color=#FFFFFFFF>Chevreuse</color>.\nWhen <color=#FFFFFFFF>Chevreuse</color>, who has this card equipped, is in play, and after opposing characters take Overloaded reaction DMG: Your next 2 instances of {SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG</color> or {SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color> dealt +1. (Including {SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG</color> or {SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color> dealt through Swirl reactions)\n(You must have Chevreuse in your deck to add this card to your deck)
storytext: "The Special Security and Surveillance Patrol deals with a whole host of heinous crimes and dangerous criminals. As such, the methods we employ to enforce the law can be a bit on the... harsher side."
source: Reward for inviting Chevreuse to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives
